title: Apple, walnut and raisin chaussons with Cheshire cheese
description: Crumbly, mild Cheshire cheese gives a British twist to this delicious apple turnover.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 11cm/4½in round cutter and a freestanding mixer with a dough hook attachment.
ingredients: 3 tart eating apples (such as Granny Smith), cored and peeled
1 large free-range egg, beaten, for glazing
